name: PlantMatter
desc: Various parts of plants and flora, usable as fuel.

name: Dirt
desc: Collected from terraforming with your Pickaxe or M.O.L.E.  Use unknown.

name: Limestone
desc: Collected from terraforming, or from minable deposits.  Actually has a use in crafting.

name: Iron Ore
desc: Extraordinarily pure source of Iron.  Convertible into Iron Ingots at a Smelter.

name: Copper Ore
desc: Extraordinarily pure source of Copper.  Convertible into Copper Ingots at a Smelter.

name: Iron Ingot
desc: Ingot of Iron.  Heavy and durable.

name: Copper Ingot
desc: Ingot of Copper.  Light and conductive.

name: Pickaxe
desc: Serviceable pickaxe.  Capable of breaking and harvesting ore from basic mineral veins.
